name: AppIcon
description:
应用图标工具

  • 汇集最全应用平台的图标要求，如 iPhone、iPad、Android、macOS 以及华为、腾讯、小米等应用市场；
  • 提供苹果开发工具 Xcode 中所要求的最全尺寸，再也不需要找研发要尺寸了；
  • 同时提供清晰的文件命名与文件目录结构，导出直接交付给研发同学。


Apply icon tool

  • Collect the icon requirements of the most complete application platforms, such as iPhone, iPad, Android, MacOS, Huawei, Tencent, Xiaomi and other application markets;
  • Provide the full size required by Apple's development tool Xcode, and you don't need to ask for the size anymore;
  • At the same time, it provides clear file naming and file directory structure, which can be exported and delivered directly to R & D students.
